text: @WhiteHouse @LindaSuhler Looters Drive Off With 80 Luxury Cars From Dealership worth $2.7 million were stolen. It was an inside job since the owner was not able to sell any due to the covid-19 shut down. He resorted to a new insurance gain strategy.
